302755.「あ～！ なつかしいぜ。ドワチャッカ大陸も\n いろいろ 変わっちまったみてえだ:
Ahhh, how nostalgic! Dwachakka's changed quite
a lot, but this place is just how I remember
it!

302756.<center>久しいな 閃光王カブよ。\nそれに 震天王ナンナ 賢哲王ドルタム:
It's been some time... Kabu, the Radiant...
Nanna, the Heavenshaker...
Doltam, the Wise...

302757.「いよう！ イプチャル！\n ４０００年ぶりか。元気にしてたか？:
Yo, Yppchal! Has it really been 4000 years?
How've you been?

302758.「相変わらず かたっくるしい じいさまだねぇ。\n 仰々しい呼び名は ナシにしと:
You're still as stubborn as ever, old timer.
Let's lay off the pompous titles, okay?
You're embarrassing me.

302760.<center>ふたたび お前たち三闘士と\n相まみえる日が 来ようとは。\nあ:
I never thought the day would come where I
would see the Triad once more. I still
remember the day we made our vow...

302761.「そうそう。アタシたちはさ\n ここで 義兄弟の契りを結んで\n 三闘士に なっ:
That's right. We formed a bond as siblings
in this very place and became the Triad.

302762.「ここから オレたちの冒険が始まったんだ。\n 長い 長い 希望への旅路が……。:
This is where our adventure started.
Our long, long journey of hope...

302763.「じつはよう……<pc>。\n ここに 連れてきてもらったのは\n お前と やり:
Actually, <pc>...the reason I
brought you here is 'cause there's something I
wanted to do together with you.

302764.「これから始まるのは アストルティアの\n 命運を 分ける戦いだ。:
What's about to begin is gonna be a battle
that decides Astoltia's fate.

302765.「オレたちに 敗北は許されない。\n ジア・クトどもから 大事なモンを守るため\:
We can't let them beat us. We have to win no
matter what, and protect what's important
to us from those Dia Kut guys!

302766.「あー そのためによう。お前と オレたちの絆を\n より強固にして 戦いに挑む必:
Ah, so that's why...I thought we should
strengthen our bond, ya know...so we can
face the battle to come. Yeah.

302767.「えっと つまりよう……。\n お前さえ 良ければなんだが\n オレたちと……そ:
Um, well, what I mean is...
As long as you're okay with it,
we can...

302768.「あ～っ もう！ まだるっこしいねぇ！\n 要するに！ アタシたち アンタと\n:
Ugggh, spit it out already! Stop dragging
your feet! Well, to put it simply...we'd like
to become "siblings" with you.

302769.「あなたと ここで 義兄弟の契りを\n 結びたいんだ。ボクたち 三闘士にとって\:
We'd like to forge a special bond as siblings
with you here. To the Triad, you're a very
important person, so...

302770.「そうだ！ お前が いっしょにいてくれたら\n オレたち どんな困難なことだって:
He's right! When you're together with us, I
feel like we can overcome anything, no
matter how tough it is!

302771.「だから 頼む！ オレたちの義兄弟に……\n 大地の四闘士に なってくれないか？:
So...please! Will you become our sibling...
So we can become the Earthen Tetrad?
<yesno><close>

302772.「気は進まないかもしれないけど お願い……！\n ボクたちが この戦いを 勝ち抜:
I know you don't want to do this, but
please...! If we're to win this battle, we
desperately need your help...<yesno><close>

302773.「……ほ 本当かッ？ 本当に本当だな？\n もう イヤだって言ったって\n 聞か:
R...really? You mean it?! Even if you say
you don't want to anymore, I'm just not
gonna listen...

302774.「ひゃっほ～～～～うッ！\n やった やった やったぁ～！\n サンキュ～ <p:
YAAAAAAAHOOOOO!!
Yes, yes, yeeeeeees!!
THANK YOU, <pc>!!

302775.「兄者ってば 断られたら どうしようって\n 直前まで ビクビクしてたんだよ。:
I was pretty nervous up until the last second
there. Not sure what I'd do if you said no!

302776.「ま！ アタシは\n アンタなら 必ず 引き受けてくれるって\n 最初から 信じ:
Anyways! I knew from the beginning that you'd
definitely accept, being the kinda person you
are.

302777.「えへへ。改めて よろしくね。\n <pc>……兄ちゃん。:
Ehehe. Nice to meet you again.
<pc>...our brother.

302778.「えへへ。改めて よろしくね。\n <pc>……姉ちゃん。:
Ehehe. Nice to meet you again.
<pc>...our sister.

302779.「よぉし！ そうと決まれば\n やることは ひとつだ！\n ほら <pc>！ こ:
Alright!! Now that that's decided, there's
just one thing left to do! <pc>!
Come on over here!

302780.「たとえ 生まれた場所\n 生まれた時代が 違ったって 関係ねえ！\n オレたち:
Where we were born, or when...it doesn't
matter! A strong bond ties us together!

302781.「オレたちが チカラを合わせれば\n かなわないことなんて 何もない……。\n:
If we work together, there's nothing that we
can't do...we can even fight that Eye of Evil!

302782.「そうさ！\n アタシたちの故郷を……アストルティアを\n ジア・クトどもの 好:
That's right! Astoltia is our homeland...and
we won't let Dia Kut have its way!

302783.「絶対に 負けたりなんかしない。\n 民を 大地を 希望を……未来を！\n ボク:
We will never give in. Our people, our land,
and our future...! We will protect them!

302784.「我ら 大地の四闘士！\n 母なる大地 アストルティアを守ると誓う！:
We, the Earthen Tetrad! We swear to defend
Astoltia, our mother earth!

302785.<center>その誓い たしかに 聞きとどけた。\n四闘士よ アストルティアの:
I have heard and acknowledged your vow.
O Tetrad. The future of Astoltia lies in
your hands...

302786.「いくぜぇ お前たち！\n この戦い……必ず 勝つぞッ！:
Come on, guys! Let's go! We'll win this
battle for sure!

302788.「へへっ 付き合ってくれて ありがとな。\n そんじゃ フォーリオンに戻るとする:
Heh heh...thanks for spending time with us.
Why don't we head back to Fourion?
Let's go, <pc>!
